title: Xenopopper
info: The Xenopopper is a Hardmode, post-Golem gun that uses bullets as ammunition, but fires a small initial cloud of four to five simultaneous "bubbles". The bubbles themselves do no damage and will bounce off solid blocks. They then pop after a short delay, firing bullets (one per bubble) that converge at the cursor's location. The targeting effect is similar to that of the Lunar Flare. Each firing consumes only one bullet, but produces four to five projectiles each.
